A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A truly terrible film that throws away all the characters and story that came before it. While not a fan of the prequels\, I find it terribly disrespectful that Lucas was cut out of the creative process that originated this franchise. With him out of the loop\, the final product feels like fan-fiction written by people who aren't fans of the series. In the end\, all the viewer is left with is a hack script with simple characters\, meaningless side stories\, unrealistic character arcs\, pointless plot twists and the untimely and meaningless end of the Skywalker saga.
